abstract: Denmark passes bill banning bestiality, amending previous ban on intercourse that hurts animals.
lead_paragraph: The bill amends a previous ban on intercourse that harms animals.

headline.main: Denmark: Bestiality Is Banned Amid Concerns of Sex Tourism
headline.print_headline: Europe; Denmark: Bestiality Is Banned Amid Concerns of Sex Tourism

snippet: The bill amends a previous ban on intercourse that harms animals.
